document.full_text: the devastating earthquake and tsunami in japan have raised concerns about nuclear power safety as that country races to stop a meltdown, but some people living near a new york nuclear plant say they have faith in u.s. safety measures.
document.title: residents near ny nuclear plant confident on safety
lines_and_colors: the devastating earthquake and tsunami in japan have raised concerns about nuclear power safety as that country races to stop a meltdown, but some people living near a new york nuclear plant say they have faith in u.s. safety measures.
